name: Beat Blocks
description:
This is a submission for Pizza Jam hosted by ComputerJames

I didn't want to do something really complex so i decided to go for a simple platformer where every block moves!

Controls: WASD + Spacebar (you can grab onto ledges and jump off of them)

BEWARE: THIS GAME IS HARD, A FEW OF MY FRIENDS DIDN'T GET PAST 2-ND LEVEL, BUT I'VE FINISHED THE GAME TWICE IN 20 MINUTES

If you manage to complete the game, please leave some feedback in the comments or send it to twitter @Dioi_colorless
